how_it_works.title: How to Convert Image to Video
how_it_works.subtitle: Simple 3-Step Process
how_it_works.description: Transform your images into videos in just three easy steps - no technical skills required.

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.description: Simply drag and drop your image or click to upload. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 10MB.

steps.title: Choose Video Style
steps.description: Select your preferred animation style, duration (1-10 seconds), and other customization options.

steps.title: Download Your Video
steps.description: Our AI processes your image and generates a stunning video. Download in MP4 format ready to share.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our image to video AI technology.

questions.question: What is image to video AI and how does it work?
questions.answer: Image to video AI is cutting-edge technology that analyzes your static images and creates dynamic videos with realistic motion. Our AI uses advanced deep learning algorithms to understand the content, depth, and context of your image, then generates smooth animations that bring your photos to life.

questions.question: Is the image to video converter really free?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer completely free image to video conversion with no hidden costs. You can convert up to 5 images per day for free. For unlimited access and premium features, check out our affordable paid plans.

questions.question: What image formats and sizes do you support?
questions.answer: We support all popular image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WebP. Maximum file size is 10MB per image. For best results, we recommend high-resolution images (at least 512x512 pixels) with clear subjects and good lighting.

questions.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
questions.answer: Our AI typically generates videos in 30-60 seconds, depending on the complexity of your image and current server load. Premium users get priority processing for even faster results.

questions.question: What video formats and quality do you provide?
questions.answer: All videos are exported in MP4 format, which is compatible with all devices and platforms. Free users get 720p HD quality, while premium users can download in 1080p Full HD resolution.

questions.question: Can I use the generated videos commercially?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You retain full ownership and commercial rights to all videos created with our platform. Use them for marketing, social media, presentations, or any other purpose without restrictions.

questions.question: Do you store my uploaded images?
questions.answer: We respect your privacy. Uploaded images are automatically deleted from our servers within 24 hours after processing. We never use your images for training or any other purposes.

questions.question: Can I customize the video duration and style?
questions.answer: Yes! You can choose video duration from 1-10 seconds and select from various animation styles including cinematic, cartoon, realistic, and artistic effects. Premium users get access to more customization options.
